explains: v. 埋葬（bury 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: buried hill 潜山；埋藏山；掩丘
buried depth 埋深；埋藏深度
buried treasure 宝藏；埋葬的宝藏；藏宝
buried pipe 埋设管，地下管
buried cable 地下电缆；直埋电缆；埋地电缆

sentences.en: She buried it under some leaves.
sentences.cn: 她把它埋藏在一些树叶下。

sentences.en: She buried her face in the pillows.
He was buried in an unmarked grave.
